page.title: 06EDUCATION
page.content: The school is built around two quadrangles. There are also two mobile classrooms which house the reception children and the bottom infants. The school is a red brick building with an imposing entrance facade in white stone comprising of four "Ionic"-like pillars. Generally, throughout is evidence of typical pre-second world war decor - half-tiled walls with a decorative border, wooden block floors etc. There are 9 full time teachers, 1 part-time(0.5) Welsh teacher, and 1 part-time(0.25) Remedial teacher.The school is well equipped with audio-visual aids,videos, televisions etc.Like most schools in the Vale of Glamorgan it has its own playing field.
